title: spawn错误！
author: 蓝之魂
txt_content: 求，输入spawn，setspawn或者复活，新号登陆等服务器都会直接崩溃，这个是什么缘故？怎么解决？

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
更新下 ess

https://ci.ender.zone/job/EssentialsX/lastSuccessfulBuild/

或者直接删掉 EssentialsXSpawn 也可以

replies.author: 蓝之魂
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-1-21 21:50
更新下 ess

https://ci.ender.zone/job/EssentialsX/lastSuccessfulBuild/
已解决！感谢回复
